Product of Accura Scan is an image processing company focused on Optical Character Recognition and Machine Vision Technology for mobile devices. Fast yet accurate text recognition solution using device camera to replace manual data entry. 1. Passports (All countries)\n2. Visa (MRZ Visa)\n3. ID Cards (MRZ Supported)\n4. Driving License (MRZ Supported)\n5. USA Driving License (PDF417)\n6. Pan Card India - Full OCR\n7. Aadhaar Card India - Full OCR\n8. All Barcodes (1D & 2D) Scanned Data 1. Once you placed the document in front of the camera within a second extracted data would appear on the screen. \n2. This apps works offline. We DON’T save your images or data on our servers, it is ONLY on your own mobile device, we don’t access it at all. \n3. You can export last 10 Scanned Data in XLS or PDF format by email.
